title: Regulating body temperature
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Charles L. Finance
brief_description: Compares ecto and endotherms. Discusses convection, conduction, radiation and insulation. Also mechanisms of sweating and shivering, and behavioural patterns relating to heat regulation. Humidity is discussed along with the role of the hypothalamus. Highlights the necessity of correct core temperature.
